com.espertech.esper.metrics.codahale_metrics.metrics.stats

Class UniformSample

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.espertech.esper.metrics.codahale_metrics.metrics.stats.UniformSample
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sample

    public class UniformSample
extends java.lang.Object
implements Sample
    A random sample of a stream of longs. Uses Vitter's Algorithm R to produce a statistically representative sample.
    See Also:
    Random Sampling with a Reservoir
